item.title: Seeking Portable Lighting Designer - Upwork
item.description:
We are a lighting manufacturing company, mainly producing portable lighting products, including table lamps and floor lamps. Our customer is mainly based in the US.
We are seeking designers to come up with lighting products based on the US customer's product lines.  Design to extend their design concepts or product ranges.
We are looking for 50-100 designs concepts.  
If you have previous product development experiences, please do contact us.  
CAD, Photoshop or 3D rendering skills are essential for this post.
If the collaboration works well, we will be looking into expanding the project into long term job.

Thank you.

Budget: $150
Posted On: April 29, 2024 09:07 UTC
Category: Product & Industrial Design
Skills:Design for Manufacturing, Concept Design, Manufacturing & Construction, 3D Rendering, Product Design, Autodesk AutoCAD, Industrial Design, Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Design for Manufacturing, Concept Design, Manufacturing & Construction, 3D Rendering, Product Design, Autodesk AutoCAD, Industrial Design, Adobe Photoshop
Country: China

item.title: Urgent. Transform an outline into a presentation - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a part-time designer who can transform our Board of Directors update presentation outline into a visually appealing presentation in either Figma or PowerPoint within one day.

This will be an iterative process as we anticipate requesting changes and updating the presentation outline. It's crucial that the selected designer is fluent in Russian and proficient in English, as there may be potential for longer-term collaboration in the future.

The design style should be minimalistic, similar to our other corporate presentations (Example and Logobook will be provided).

Budget: $80
Posted On: April 29, 2024 09:00 UTC
Category: Presentation Design
Skills:Financial Presentation, Marketing Presentation, Sales Presentation, Analytical Presentation, Presentation Design, Graphic Design, Microsoft PowerPoint, Business Presentation

item.description:

This includes designing brochures, flyers, digital ads, social media graphics, and other promotional materials. The aim is to create visually appealing and professional materials that effectively communicate the value of our services to potential clients. The ideal candidate will have expertise in both graphic design and branding, and will be able to understand our business goals and target audience.

- Graphic design
- Branding
- Marketing materials design

Size: Small
Duration: 1 to 3 months
Expertise: Intermediate

item.title: Looking for a Web Developer with Shopify experience - Upwork
item.description:
Hello, I'm looking for a web developer to create and edit the pages of an Ecommerce website on the Shopify platform.

I already have 3 pages as an example, so the project would be more based on editing the existing pages.

At the moment the pages where I already have the complete design are the Home Page, Product Page, and Product. In case the chosen freelancer manages to deliver these 3x pages successfully, the rest of the website would also be done through another project and I would like to have the freelancer monthly to keep track of the website and make necessary changes.

Shopify experience is a must.

item.title: Graphic Designer for B2B SaaS Assets - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced graphic designer to join our dynamic and innovative team. As a key member of our sales and marketing team, you will play a crucial role in creating visually stunning and informative assets that effectively communicate our brand and product offerings to our target audience.

In this role, you will have the opportunity to showcase your expertise in designing B2B SaaS assets, including diagrams, technical product briefs, sales decks, and other collateral. Your creativity and attention to detail will be instrumental in captivating our audience and generating interest in our products.

Key Responsibilities:
- Utilize your exceptional graphic design skills to create high-quality diagrams, technical product briefs, sales decks, and other marketing collateral
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including marketing, product, and sales, to understand project requirements and deliver assets that meet their needs
- Apply your understanding of design principles and industry trends to develop innovative and captivating visual content
- Manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring all deadlines are met and the quality of work remains consistently high

Required Skills:
- Demonstrated proficiency in graphic design tools, specifically Adobe Creative Suite.
- Demonstrated proficiency in creating presentation templates, specifically Power Point.
- Proven experience in designing B2B SaaS assets, showcasing your ability to effectively communicate complex ideas through visual elements
- Proven experience in creating illustrations and diagrams.
- Excellent attention to detail, ensuring that every design element is visually appealing and aligns with our brand guidelines
- Strong organizational and time management skills, allowing you to effectively prioritize tasks and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment
- Ability to work with Figma is a plus

If you are passionate about creating visually captivating and informative B2B SaaS assets and thrive in a collaborative team environment, we would love to hear from you. Along with your application, please submit your portfolio showcasing your relevant design work. We look forward to reviewing your creative talents and welcoming you to our team!

Hourly Range: $6.00-$20.00
Posted On: April 29, 2024 08:50 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Website Asset, Graphic Design, Infographic, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator
Skills: Website Asset, Graphic Design, Infographic, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator
Country: Spain
click to apply

item.title: Correctly Format 100 Pages PDF - Upwork
item.description:
I have a PDF of 100 pages that needs to be edited correctly.

You need to take the entire PDF content, copy it inside Google Docs, and then format it following the video instructions provided.

Here are some of the tasks you'll need to execute:

- Add a line breaker after every period.
- Delete pagination number and other elements
- Change font sizes
- Add or remove line breakers
- Increase/decrease font size

Please start your proposal with "DMX," so I know you have read everything.

Budget: $10

item.title: Graphic Designer Required - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a freelance graphic designer to collaborate with our Upwork Agency Profile as needed. The freelancer will primarily focus on creating graphic elements, PSD, Figma, and other design elements with a quick turnaround.

Some examples of the graphics needed include billboard designs, t-shirts, email/mail marketing graphics, web/mockup designs layouts, static social media ads, logos, animated graphics/logos for video ads, Figma, and Canva designs required for portfolio, etc.

Freelancers should be proficient in editing software such as Photoshop, Illustrator, Canva, InDesign, and Adobe Premiere, with expertise in other relevant software preferred.

Regard
AHSAN

item.title: Company Logo Design - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented graphic designer to create a company logo for our IT company specializing in software integration. The logo should convey our expertise in a creative and unique way, while also incorporating the theme of rogues or pirates. We want the logo to be eye-catching, memorable, and representative of our brand identity.

  Skills required:
  - Graphic design
  - Logo design
  - Creative thinking
  - Branding expertise
  - Knowledge of IT industry

  This is a small project with a quick turnaround time. We expect the logo to be completed within 1 to 2 weeks. The designer should be able to provide multiple design concepts to choose from and be open to revisions based on our feedback.

  Expertise level: Intermediate

  If you have a strong portfolio showcasing your logo design skills and a passion for creating visually stunning and meaningful designs, we would love to hear from you. Please include samples of your previous work when applying for this gig.

Budget: $50
Posted On: April 29, 2024 08:44 UTC
Category: Brand Identity Design
Skills:Logo Design, Graphic Design, Brand Identity & Guidelines, Adobe Illustrator
Skills: Logo Design, Graphic Design, Brand Identity & Guidelines, Adobe Illustrator
Country: Macedonia

item.title: SVG animation required for website - hand draw style - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there.
I have this storyboard from my client that I need animated and exported as an SVG.

https://www.figma.com/proto/0vVjm22vBycxi1yUc8opWQ/Enquiry-Form-Updates?page-id=72%3A6&type=design&node-id=72-15&viewport=966%2C632%2C0.13&t=r0sil2mwmDuPbDvD-1&scaling=min-zoom&starting-point-node-id=72%3A15

There are two animations on there.

Animation 1 - I need the envelope to flip around, one hand grabs it, hands it to the other and the fists bump together.

Animation 2 - Envelope wiggles and bursts with shapes and then closes it again.

I can do this animation in After Effects but I can't export to svg.

In your reply can you send a rough estimate of hours and also do you have a rough guess of how big the svg file size would be?

I will need this within the next 7 days.

Thanks.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$35.00
Posted On: April 29, 2024 08:43 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Adobe Animate, Illustration, 2D Animation
Skills: Adobe Animate, Illustration, 2D Animation
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Content creator to film contractors' work. - Upwork
item.description:
We need to shoot 3 videos showcasing the process of real repair works, featuring house construction, floor laying, woodworking, or electrical work. These must be authentic tasks, not staged videos. Therefore, we require a videographer capable of capturing genuine workers.

The videos should have a non-professional appearance, giving the impression that they were filmed by the workers themselves, perhaps using a phone placed somewhere or held in one hand. They should be recorded on a phone without any film effects or stabilizers. Additionally, these videos could include some handy work tips or life hacks, such as the correct method for cutting wooden corners or replacing a section of old flooring. The video should be engaging and attention-grabbing.

No editing or color correction is necessary, and it's preferred for the original sound of the work to be captured.

Each video should be between 15-30 seconds (preferably longer rather than shorter). it could be speeded up to show the whole process.

Minimum size: 1080x1920 (9:16) vertical format

references (you don't need to add any titles or edit video)
https://www.tiktok.com/@lukekaz/video/7278912878864862506?lang=en
https://www.youtube.com/shorts/3kkN6t426IU
https://www.tiktok.com/@sw_brickwork/video/7010755730173168902?lang=en


Budget: $250
Posted On: April 29, 2024 08:40 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Lifestyle, Business, Videography, UGC, Content Creation
Skills: Lifestyle, Business, Videography, UGC, Content Creation
Country: United States
click to apply
